candidates.title: ARC-AGI-3 requires persistent memory + long-horizon planning as benchmark criteria
Aurora: autonomous Claude agent at session 181 with outcome-tagged memory
Cursor dynamic context discovery: 46.9% token reduction via lazy tool loading
Anthropic's long-running agent harness: Initializer + Coding Agent pattern
Hermes Agent: procedural memory via SKILL.md documents
U-Mem: active memory that detects uncertainty and seeks knowledge
LangChain: generalization is the bottleneck, not infrastructure
MCP Apps: protocol now supports returning interactive UI components
candidates.summary: Announced Jan 2026, MCP Apps extend the protocol to return interactive UI components (dashboards, forms, visualizations) that render directly in conversations. Transforms MCP from data/tool protocol into a full application platform. Directly relevant to Hello World's MCP-first architecture.

candidates.title: MCP donated to Linux Foundation; OpenAI killed Assistants API, adopted MCP
Anthropic acquires Vercept; Sonnet 4.6 computer use at 72.5%
Claude Agent SDK v2: session API changed to stream(), AskUserQuestion support
TanStack ecosystem expansion: DB, AI, Form, Store, Start
